For 普通分手
分手之後，應該忘記就要忘記! 調整好自己既心情，讓自己早日得到解脫。
放低真係要完完全全去靠自己，時間係最好既方法。
咩承諾呀乜乜柒柒 當一個人唔再鐘意你 要同你分手既話，呢啲所有一切既野都係廢。
你都識講係你自己做得唔好啦 仲想人地番黎你身邊 害死人呀你
你咪當今次拍拖比你學到唔同既野囉 下次咪唔好重覆你上次拍拖個陣做既錯事囉

For 被出軌
唔明點解啲人要出軌
細水長流唔好咩，變左親人咁唔好咩
點解硬係要做一啲嘢黎傷害果個陪左你咁耐嘅人
新鮮感係會有，但知道開始有呢種感覺都好應該避忌啦
點解唔係去避忌
要一直玩火
有幾多人明白新鮮感總會淡 又有幾多人明白感情係要維繫而唔係一唔開心就換個第二個？
正所謂係鐘意佢嘅，又點會要佢傷心

仆街渣男心態

係時候要準備行出去感受番個世界
時間係最好既藥 發生左就係發生左

好想話佢知我呢幾日點過 做左啲咩 有咩活動喺我地分手呢幾日我走去做完 覺得佢都會想一齊做 好想同佢分享

約朋友出嚟玩 玩完一日就熱鬧過後感到空虛 一靜落嚟又會諗起佢 又會想忍唔住搵佢 同佢講返啲回憶 希望可以感動返突然話搵唔到對我嘅Feel要同我分手嘅佢
好多嘢講好一齊去做但又未做完 以後冇人陪 要自己一個去做 諗起個心又Up住Up住 慣左做咩都有佢陪 但當分手之後就好似冇左個世界咁
成日諗啲會為情輕生嘅人真係好傻 自己未經歷過都會話你條仔/女唔係你全世界 但當自己失去左佢之後都會覺得世界好空洞 以前返工努力讀書 都會有目標 會覺得為左我地未來幾唔想做都變得有動力 依家咩都唔想做 咩都唔想學 返工賺錢唔知為乜 我唔會自殺 我好驚死 但我都好想有意外了結左呢一切 好辛苦好痛我唔想再諗 無論做幾多嘢分自己心都好 當一靜落嚟就會開始諗 臨訓前又會諗 我冇信仰 但都好想佢返嚟我身邊 早晚祈一次禱 好絕望唔知可以點算 呢段時間真係經歷左人生最痛最苦最難過嘅時刻

我又講下我嘅故事啦巴打

我同個女仔都有另一半，喺關係破裂之前，我哋算係曖昧嘅朋友關係。大概去到11月尾12頭嗰陣，對方講嘅嘢開始有少少奇怪，對我都忽冷忽熱，我好擔心佢唔再理我，於是對佢過份關心，終於佢忍無可忍，決定離開我嘅生活。

嗰陣我一直喺度鑽牛角尖同不停blame佢，佢曾經講到我有幾咁重要，甚至話過佢個人其實好灰，但我會係佢其中一個佢唔會自殺嘅原因，咁點解當我不安嗰陣，佢冇理過我嘅感受？點解當佢唔鍾意我chur佢嗰陣，佢一直都唔同我講，直到頂唔順然後就突然離開？如果當初唔係我問佢，可能我直到最後都冇辦法知係咩原因。

但後來我去見心理輔導嗰陣，個psychologist同我講，你點知道人哋冇苦衷，你點解要逼人畀答案你？呢段關係本身就唔正常，對方承受嘅壓力你又知唔知道？

由一開始搞亂咗段關係嗰個唔係第個，就係你自己，你自己思維已經好亂，唔單止冇冷靜落嚟，仲令件事火上加油，你自己先係破壞呢段關係嘅原兇

呢段嘢唔單止同你講，我亦係同我自己講嘅

If you could switch to the news" She recently got some new clothes on the cheap from a shop that's about to go into liquidation. She bought a pair of cheap trainers that fell apart after a few months so I bought her a pair of good quality ones. She's too mean to buy new shoes. She's very cheap with the air conditioner too- it's only on for an hour each day then she turns on the fans and opens the windows instead but the air conditioner was sort cheap. She vacationed in Macau three months ago but she's so cheap she didn't even buy us postcards. She stayed at a three star hotel where it serves cheap and cheerful food and sells cheap and cheerful clothes. Amy is a flutist. She explained to us regarding a piece by Clementi "this passage should be played lyrically instead of rhythmically. Otherwise it's a bit cheap" I saw lots of his pencil marks on the score such as cantabile, silence, no pause here, clean pedal, just separate, more melodic voicing, remain soft, stay soft, quiet, hear tenor, clearer, articulate, in time, silvery soft, gentler, take time....Regarding teaching she said "I prefer payment in blocks. My students pay monthly or for four lessons at a time. For this month it's ok to pay on a lesson-by-lesson basis since you might wanna see what its like to have lessons. From next month onwards pay monthly. Students of all standards are welcome. Some of my students started learning flute when they were eighteen. Their fingers are less dextrous and slower than say a ten year old boy. So start training your fingers when you're still very young so that you'll get much faster fingers. Itll improve your finger speed, strength, accuracy and dexterity to a large extent. I'm also an accompanist who accompanies singers for live performances." Amy asked me to get her some Haydn scores as I can get them on the cheap from a friend of mine. We watched a kickboxing fight in which Paul hit chris with a cheap shot after he lost to chris. We watched a comedy show as well which was full of cheap laughs. The comedian is famous for his vulgar manner and wearing a vulgar suit. His granddad was a cheap gangster and liar. His jokes and jibes were cheap and vulgar. Amy is a bunny lover who has a Holland lop and a Netherland dwarf. Rabbits are prey animals which means they're everybody else's lunch in nature. A dog barking, a child shouting, an airplane roaring overhead, an ambulance siren wailing and a lightning storm can frighten rabbits. Therefore taking a rabbit on a leash isn't recommended..Indoor rabbits have a much longer lifespan than outdoor rabbits because they're protected from poor weather conditions and enemies. They feel safe, protected, sheltered, monitored and that they're part of the family! The average lifespan of an indoor house rabbit is eight to fourteen years while the average lifespan of a rabbit kept in an outdoor hutch or cage is three to six years. The happiest rabbit expression is called a binky. When a bunny binkies it jumps into the air and twists its head and body in the opposite direction before falling back to the ground. A happy rabbit even twirls, flops, stretches its legs and shakes its head. All these are telling you that it is happy and overall pleased with you and its life. Rabbit produce two types of droppings: fecal pellets and cecal pellets (aka cecotropes) The former are the dry round ones you usually see in the litterbox whereas the latter one are edible for rabbits which contains essential nutrients. Rabbits are one of the most abandoned pets in the world.
